# Canvas2D (Live)
001 
  

Diagram myDiagram +dynamic {
  [@12,19]
  interface Interface1 +stereotype="base" {
    operation op1 : Int +protected;
  }

  [@27,132]
  class SubClass1 : Interface1 +stereotype="sub" {
    attribute attr1 : String +private;
    operation op1 : Int +protected {
      parameter param1 : String;
    }
  }

  [@199,19]
  class BaseClass1 +abstract {
    operation op1 : Int +protected;
  }

  [@190,132]
  class SubClass2 : BaseClass1 {
    attribute attr1 : String +private;
    operation op1 : Int +protected {
      parameter param1 : String;
    }
  }

  [@vertical]
  association myInterface1s {
    role baseclass : BaseClass1 +composite;
    role interface : Interface1 +navigable;
  }

  [@vertical]
  dependency mySubClasses1 {
    client subclass : SubClass2;
    supplier othersubclass : SubClass1;
  }
}
002
003 
  
Diagram Example +dynamic {
  [@115,35]
  interface Clonable {
    Operation clone;
  }
  [@60,125]
  interface LoggerInterface : Clonable {
    Operation log {
      Argument data : String;
    }
  }
  [@150,125]
  Class Logger : Clonable {
    Operation log{
      Argument data : String;
    }
  }
}
004 
  
Diagram Prototype +dynamic {
  [@16,41]
  class Client {
  }
  [@184,32]
  interface Prototype {
    operation clone : Prototype +public;
  }
  [@192,164]
  class PrototypeA : Prototype {
    operation clone : Prototype +public;
  }
  [@vertical]
  association a6508 {
    role Client : Client;
    role Prototype : Prototype +navigable;
  }
  association recursive {
    role Client1 : Client +navigable;
    role Client2 : Client +composite;
  }
}
